data.name: APositiveAnswerToAnyOfThose
data.value: A positive answer to any of those likely means you are breaking the stewarding rules.

data.name: Appoint
data.value: Appoint

data.name: AppointAStewardBeforeAccountDeletion
data.value: If you go on vacation, you must appoint a steward or risk having your account deleted - If you are inactive for 14 days and you have appointed a steward who has not accepted the appointment, your account will be deleted from the galaxy and your planet will become ownerless.

data.name: AppointNow
data.value: Appoint now

data.name: AreYouSureQuestionMark
data.value: Are you sure? This cannot be undone. Consider transferring the stewardship to another player. Login as this player to do so and go to Account Stewardship again.

data.name: AskYourselfTheseQuestions
data.value: As a steward, ask yourself these questions:

data.name: AsMyAccountSteward
data.value: as my account steward

data.name: BeActiveAsMuchAsPossible
data.value: In a real-time game such as this, you must be active as your friends and clan-mates depend on you. If you go on vacation, you must appoint a steward or risk having your account on the galaxy deleted - If you are inactive for 14 days and you have appointed a steward

data.name: CannotHaveMultipleTabsWhenSteward
data.value: when logging in as a steward, remember that you cannot have multiple tabs opened! You cannot have your account and account you are stewarding opened at the same time in multiple tabs or windows. Doing so may result in errors. Close all tabs before logging in as steward.

data.name: StewardCannotPoints
data.value: What the steward cannot do

data.name: StewardOfMyKingdom
data.value: Steward of my empire

data.name: StewardshipIsForTemporaryAbsence
data.value: Stewardship is designed for a temporary absence and NOT for allowing a player to effectively play with another account. Therefore stewardship is automatically cancelled 30 days after the owner of the account has last logged in; at which point the account will be deleted from the galaxy (losing all planets)

data.name: StewardshipIsForUpToThirtyDays
data.value: * Stewardship is for maximum 30 days.

data.name: StewardshipNotes
data.value: Notes: (1) For various reasons, accounts with paid features unlocked on a realm will not be deleted until the feature(s) expire

data.name: StewardshipPointsFour
data.value:
• Am I stewarding this player mostly for my benefit?
  • Am I stewarding this player in order to make it easier for me or anyone else to take over the planets of this player either now or in the future?
  • Am I stewarding this account to attack some player with this and my account?

data.name: StewardshipPointsOne
data.value:
• Once you appoint a steward (the steward will get an in-game mail notification), they will be able to either reject or accept the appointment
  • Once accepted, your steward will be able to login as you and play as you. Your clan Administrators will be able to see that your account is being managed by this person at this point of time.
  • The steward can cancel the appointment at any time but once they do so, they will lose control of the account. Your steward can also transfer the stewardship to someone else.
  • The steward can activate or cancel any premium feature or the nobility package

data.name: StewardshipPointsThree
data.value:
• No coordinated attacks on the same player: The steward cannot attack the same player with both his account and account he is stewarding during stewardship, 48 hours before stewarding was accepted and 48 hours after after stewardship is cancelled by either party
  • The steward cannot support themselves with the account he manages.
  • The steward cannot attack the account they manage during the stewardship and up to 48 hours after stewardship is cancelled
  • The steward cannot send minerals to himself from the account he manages.
  • You must abide by the

data.name: StewardshipPointsTwo
data.value:
• Using stewarding in order to play multiple accounts is strictly prohibited.
  • The steward must play the account solely for the benefit of this account. Actions to benefit the steward's account are prohibited.
  • Gifting planets is strictly prohibited. Steward can never give away planets of the account he is managing to other players (even with the account owners' consent).
  • Some specific examples:

data.name: TellMeMore
data.value: tell me more...

data.value: Transferring account to steward:

data.name: TransferStewardshipTo
data.value: Transfer stewardship to

data.name: TransferToAnotherSteward
data.value: Transfer to another Steward

data.name: TryingToTransferStewardshipToYourself
data.value: You are trying to tranfers the stewardship to yourself! Now that's just silly! :)

data.name: YesGo
data.value: YES, GO!

data.name: YouAreTheStewardOfThisAccount
data.value: You are the steward of this account. You may transfer this responsibility to someone else but note that once you do, you will lose access to this account. ENSURE that the person you are transferring this account to, is aware of this reponsibility and will accept it.

data.name: MustAcceptTheRules
data.value:
You must accept the following rules.
Note that breaking any of these may result in a permanent ban.

data.name: YourStewardCannot
data.value:
Your steward cannot:
  • disband your ships
  • attack anyone with your account
  • downgrade your buildings
  • transfer any of your servants
  • invite your facebook friends, send gifts, or view any pages related to invites you sent out.

data.name: AccountWillBeDeleted
data.value: your account will be deleted from the galaxy and you will lose ALL your planets

data.name: WhoHasNotAccepted
data.value: who has not accepted the appointment

data.name: YouCanOnlyAppointOneSteward
data.value: You can appoint only one steward however your steward can transfer the stewardship to someone else.
